database_snapshot.database_version: PostgreSQL 17.6 on aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu, compiled by gcc (GCC) 13.2.0, 64-bit
database_snapshot.note: Complete database snapshot generated via CREATE_DATABASE_SNAPSHOT.sql. Contains all metadata for 96 tables, 683 functions, 558 indexes, 185 RLS policies, and performance metrics. Security: 99% RLS coverage (95/96 tables). Only spatial_ref_sys lacks RLS (PostGIS system table).
